title: Sling bullet
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

| Name        | Sling bullet                                                                             |
| :---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Launcher    | [Hunting sling](/Hunting_sling "Hunting sling") / [Fustibalus](/Fustibalus "Fustibalus") |
| Base damage | 4                                                                                        |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A small, heavy projectile shaped specifically for use with slings. It is more effective as ammunition than simple stones.***"For when things are once come to the execution, there is no secrecy comparable to celerity; like the motion of a bullet in the air, which flieth so swift as it outruns the eye."-Francis Bacon, \_Essays\_, "Of Delays". 1625. |

[Sling bullets]() are one of the two kinds of [missiles](/Missile "Missile") fired from a [hunting sling](/Hunting_sling "Hunting sling") or [fustibalus](/Fustibalus "Fustibalus") using the [Slings](/Slings "Slings") skill (the other being [stones](/Stone "Stone")). They deal more damage than stones, but cannot simply be thrown.

|                                                                  |
| ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Sling bullet                                                     |
| [![Bullet 1.png](/images/f/fb/Bullet_1.png)](/File:Bullet_1.png) |

## History

- Sling bullets were removed with all launcher ammo in [0.29](/0.29 "0.29").
- Prior to [0.18](/0.18 "0.18"), sling bullets could generate with a variety of [brands](/Brand "Brand").
- In [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), [slings](/Sling_\(item\) "Sling (item)") were renamed to [hunting slings](/Hunting_sling "Hunting sling") and [greatslings](/Greatsling "Greatsling") were added as a new weapon.

| [Weapons](/Weapon "Weapon")                          |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ---------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [Axes](/Axes "Axes")                                 | [Battleaxe](/Battleaxe "Battleaxe") • [Broad axe](/Broad_axe "Broad axe") • [Executioner's axe](/Executioner%27s_axe "Executioner's axe") • [Hand axe](/Hand_axe "Hand axe") • [War axe](/War_axe "War axe")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| [Maces & Flails](/Maces_%26_Flails "Maces & Flails") | [Club](/Club "Club") • [Demon whip](/Demon_whip "Demon whip") • [Dire flail](/Dire_flail "Dire flail") • [Eveningstar](/Eveningstar "Eveningstar") • [Flail](/Flail "Flail") • [Giant club](/Giant_club "Giant club") • [Giant spiked club](/Giant_spiked_club "Giant spiked club") • [Great mace](/Great_mace "Great mace") • [Mace](/Mace "Mace") ([Hammer](/Hammer "Hammer")) • [Morningstar](/Morningstar "Morningstar") • [Sacred scourge](/Sacred_scourge "Sacred scourge") • [Whip](/Whip "Whip") |
| [Long Blades](/Long_Blades "Long Blades")            | [Demon blade](/Demon_blade "Demon blade") • [Double sword](/Double_sword "Double sword") • [Eudemon blade](/Eudemon_blade "Eudemon blade") • [Falchion](/Falchion "Falchion") • [Great sword](/Great_sword "Great sword") • [Long sword](/Long_sword "Long sword") • [Scimitar](/Scimitar "Scimitar") • [Triple sword](/Triple_sword "Triple sword")                                                                                                                                                     |
| [Polearms](/Polearms "Polearms")                     | [Bardiche](/Bardiche "Bardiche") • [Demon trident](/Demon_trident "Demon trident") • [Glaive](/Glaive "Glaive") • [Halberd](/Halberd "Halberd") ([Scythe](/Scythe "Scythe")) • [Spear](/Spear "Spear") • [Trident](/Trident "Trident") • [Trishula](/Trishula "Trishula")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| [Ranged Weapons](/Ranged_Weapons "Ranged Weapons")   | [Arbalest](/Arbalest "Arbalest") • [Hand cannon](/Hand_cannon "Hand cannon") • [Longbow](/Longbow "Longbow") • [Orcbow](/Orcbow "Orcbow") • [Shortbow](/Shortbow "Shortbow") • [Sling](/Sling "Sling") • [Triple crossbow](/Triple_crossbow "Triple crossbow")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| [Short Blades](/Short_Blades "Short Blades")         | [Dagger](/Dagger "Dagger") • [Quick blade](/Quick_blade "Quick blade") • [Rapier](/Rapier "Rapier") • [Short sword](/Short_sword "Short sword")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| [Staves](/Staves "Staves")                           | [Lajatang](/Lajatang "Lajatang") • [Magical staff](/Magical_staff "Magical staff") • [Quarterstaff](/Quarterstaff "Quarterstaff")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Throwing](/Throwing "Throwing")                     | [Boomerang](/Boomerang "Boomerang") • [Dart](/Dart "Dart") • [Javelin](/Javelin "Javelin") • [Large rock](/Large_rock "Large rock") • [Stone](/Stone "Stone") • [Throwing net](/Throwing_net "Throwing net")                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
html:
Sling bullet

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.
Name Sling bullet
Launcher Hunting sling / Fustibalus
Base damage 4
A small, heavy projectile shaped specifically for use with slings. It is more effective as ammunition than simple stones.

"For when things are once come to the execution, there is no secrecy comparable to celerity; like the motion of a bullet in the air, which flieth so swift as it outruns the eye."

-Francis Bacon, _Essays_, "Of Delays". 1625.

Sling bullets are one of the two kinds of missiles fired from a hunting sling or fustibalus using the Slings skill (the other being stones). They deal more damage than stones, but cannot simply be thrown.

Sling bullet

History

  • Sling bullets were removed with all launcher ammo in 0.29.
  • Prior to 0.18, sling bullets could generate with a variety of brands.
  • In 0.15, slings were renamed to hunting slings and greatslings were added as a new weapon.
Weapons
Axes Battleaxe • Broad axe • Executioner's axe • Hand axe • War axe
Maces & Flails Club • Demon whip • Dire flail • Eveningstar • Flail • Giant club • Giant spiked club • Great mace • Mace (Hammer) • Morningstar • Sacred scourge • Whip
Long Blades Demon blade • Double sword • Eudemon blade • Falchion • Great sword • Long sword • Scimitar • Triple sword
Polearms Bardiche • Demon trident • Glaive • Halberd (Scythe) • Spear • Trident • Trishula
Ranged Weapons Arbalest • Hand cannon • Longbow • Orcbow • Shortbow • Sling • Triple crossbow
Short Blades Dagger • Quick blade • Rapier • Short sword
Staves Lajatang • Magical staff • Quarterstaff
Throwing Boomerang • Dart • Javelin • Large rock • Stone • Throwing net

{{flavour|A small, heavy projectile shaped specifically for use with slings. It is more effective as ammunition than simple stones.

----

"For when things are once come to the execution, there is no secrecy comparable to celerity; like the motion of a bullet in the air, which flieth so swift as it outruns the eye."

-Francis Bacon, _Essays_, "Of Delays". 1625.}}

[[Sling bullet]]s are one of the two kinds of [[missile]]s fired from a [[hunting sling]] or [[fustibalus]] using the [[Slings]] skill (the other being [[stone]]s). They deal more damage than stones, but cannot simply be thrown.

{| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center"
| Sling bullet
|-
| [[File:Bullet 1.png]]
|}

==History==
*Sling bullets were removed with all launcher ammo in [[0.29]].
*Prior to [[0.18]], sling bullets could generate with a variety of [[brand]]s.
*In [[0.15]], [[sling (item)|slings]] were renamed to [[hunting sling]]s and [[greatsling]]s were added as a new weapon.
